name: 21 Pro: Blackjack Multi-Hand
description:
Shuffle up and deal! It’s time to take it to the house with 21 Pro: Blackjack! Play and enjoy the authentic experience today! Win the progressive jackpot with a Triple 777's hand. Get our app and start a Blackjack 21 hot streak now!

- Win the PROGRESSIVE Jackpot!
- Play multiple hands at once with our multi-hand option!
- Set the table limits for high stakes action & reload anytime you need chips!
- Become a pro with FREE lessons and tips!
- Ask the dealer for advice and improve!
- Customize your cards and table for the! perfect Vegas casino setting!
- In-depth stats to help you track your progress!
- Players Club: Earn rewards and bonuses with every hand you play!

The Fun Vegas Casino Experience on the go! Don't forget to check our Slots, Slot Machine and other casino apps, including blackjack, roulette, craps and poker.
